name: New Baby Salon Spa Games for Kids (Girl & Boy)
name_original: New Baby Salon Spa Games for Kids (Girl & Boy)
description:
Can you help out Mom & her newborn Babies?

Play the best Kids Salon Story game in the app store today!! 8+ fun games wrapped up into a single game!!

Sooo many Levels & Game Modes:
- Help out Mommy as she gets ready for the big day!
- Hurry! The newborn babies are hungry!
- Take the triplet babies to the beach!!
- Much more salon & dress-up fun!! Enjoy

Have soooo much fun!! Enjoy!
